mapper.organization_page: from Organization o where 1=1 <#if name?? && name!=''> and o.name like :name </#if> <#if level!=0> and o.level = :level </#if> and o.deleted=:deleted order by o.createDate desc
mapper.role_page: from Role r where 1=1 <#if name?? && name!=''> and r.name like :name </#if> order by r.createDate desc
mapper.user_page: from User u where 1=1 <#if keyword?? && keyword!=''> and (u.account like :keyword or u.realName like :keyword) </#if> order by u.createDate desc
